name: stanfordnlp/SHP
description: The Stanford Human Preferences (SHP) dataset is a unique resource for researchers seeking to understand collective human preferences. The dataset consists of 385K preferences over responses to questions and instructions in 18 different subject areas, ranging from cooking and entertainment to legal advice and education. The preferences indicate the perceived usefulness of responses, offering valuable insights into human judgment and decision-making that can inform the development of more effective AI models.

keywords: human feedback, rlhf, preferences, reddit, preference model, RL, NLG, evaluation
